channel.title: Zaynix! - A completely new 508!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Zaynix[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[b][center]Website: (Still being worked on)[/center] [b][center][url=http://www.zaynix.com][size=18pt]www.zaynix.com[/size][/url][/center]
[B][CENTER]Release Date Expected Soon![/CENTER]
[size=24pt][b]About:[/b][/size] Here at we strive to offer you a challenging, yet fun, safe and secure server and to build on what the players want. The server itself will be based off a #508 revision, however it will not be a remake of Runescape, but a new server with new Npc's, Location's and a low Xp Rate of x8. This server will not be a Pking server where you can get maxed in a day, however it will bring Pking, Skilling, Dueling and Training all into a perfect balance to make a very rewarding server.
[size=24pt][b]Site:[/b][/size] - [COLOR=orange]Site[/COLOR]
[size=24pt][b]Entities:[/b][/size] - Player: - NPC - Objects - Items
[size=24pt][b]MYSQL:[/b][/size] - [COLOR=orange]Highscores (Still needs some tweaks and front-end work)[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Player Loadng from Forums[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]ModCP[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Membership System[/COLOR]
[size=24pt][b]Combat:[/b][/size] - [COLOR=orange]Melee (Few minor tweaks to weapon speeds then its finished)[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Ranged[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Magic[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Special Attacks[/COLOR]
[size=24pt][b]Skills:[/b][/size] - [COLOR=green]Prayer [/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Runecrafting[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Agility[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Herblore [/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Thieving[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Crafting[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Fletching [/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Slayer[/COLOR] - [COLOR=orange]Mining[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Smithing [/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Cooking[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Fishing[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Woodcutting [/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Firemaking[/COLOR] - [COLOR=orange]Farming[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Construction [/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Hunter[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Summoning[/COLOR]
[size=24pt][b]Other:[/b][/size] - [COLOR=red]Quests (Will all be new quests) [/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Custom Minigame[/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Music and Sounds [/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Random Events[/COLOR] - [COLOR=orange]Custom Magic Book[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Skillcape Emotions [/COLOR] - [COLOR=red]Lottery System[/COLOR] - [COLOR=green]Bank Pins[/COLOR]
[size=24pt][b]Note: There are a lot more features that will or have been added than listed, and will update this list as I go[/b][/size]
[size=24pt][b]Media:[/b][/size]
[B][U]Welcome[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/25oup91.png[/img]
[B][U]Thieving[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/k2l5ro.png[/img]
[B][U]Woodcutting[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/k2zhix.png[/img]
[B][U]Firemaking[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/1043uo6.png[/img]
[B][U]Fishing[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/1zzp4ex.png[/img]
[B][U]Bank Pins[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/29m59h5.png[/img]
[B][U]Custom Magic Book[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i66.tinypic.com/2zxqx41.png[/img]
[B][U]Skillcape Emotes[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2mc7r6a.png[/img]

item.title: Zaynix! - A completely new 508!
item.dc:creator: @confection confection
item.description:
@confection wrote:

[center][size=24pt]Zaynix[/size][/center]

[b][center]Website: (Still being worked on)[/center]
[b][center][size=18pt]www.zaynix.com[/size][/center]

[B][CENTER]Release Date Expected Soon![/CENTER]

[size=24pt]About:[/size]
Here at we strive to offer you a challenging, yet fun, safe and secure server and to build on what the players want. The server itself will be based off a #508 revision, however it will not be a remake of Runescape, but a new server with new Npc’s, Location’s and a low Xp Rate of x8. This server will not be a Pking server where you can get maxed in a day, however it will bring Pking, Skilling, Dueling and Training all into a perfect balance to make a very rewarding server.

- [COLOR=orange]Site[/COLOR]

[size=24pt]Entities:[/size]

- Objects
- Items
